name: 鄭辰仰
objective:
當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，智慧生產工程師需考量如何整合智慧製造與精實生產。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解智慧製造在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂精實導向的企業。
Since business are moving toward information and automation, smart production engineers need to consider how to integrate smart manufacturing and lean production. The goal of this course is to help students understand the application of smart manufacturing in the factory and to learn to build a so-called lean-oriented enterprise.
schedule:
1. 智慧生產概論
2. PLC 概念與實作
3. MES 概念與實作
4. 精實製造概念與實作
scorePolicy:
期中考 (30%)
期末考 (30%)
課堂實作練習 (40%)
